ygData.subject: 130 Strn Rocks!
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok - I know 130 is ok for strength, especially when I go berserk and it rises to 140!  But when I finally get to a level were I need and can afford plate mail,
ygData.messageBody:
Ok - I know 130 is ok for strength, especially when I go berserk and it
rises to 140! But when I finally get to a level were I need and can afford
plate mail, I am sure I will still be weighted down. The question is: What
is around to magically raise my strength?

OOC: If you guys are spending your nights dreaming about female PCs, think
about this - Blonde hair, green eyes, 38 year old computer programmer
falling asleep at her keyboard while zoning to unrest!

For the Honor and Glory of Rallos Zek;

Patty of Halas
username: Patricia
server: Bristlebane
